front.div:
NPC – Numerical Predictive Check – is a model diagnostics tool. VPC – Visual Predictive Check – is
another closely related diagnostics tool. A set of simulated datasets are generated using the model to be
evaluated. Afterwards the real data observations are compared with the distribution of the simulated
observations. By default no model estimation is ever performed. The input to the NPC script is the
model to be evaluated, the number of samples (simulated datasets) to generate, parameter values
options for the simulations, and stratification options for the evaluation. It is also possible to skip the
simulation step entirely by giving two already created tablefiles as input. The input to the VPC script is
the input to NPC plus an additional set of options. A large portion of the processing is identical
between the scripts.
